funFacts: Cats can jump up to six times their body length.
Cats have five toes on their front paws, but only four on their back paws.
A cat's nose is as unique as a human's fingerprint.
Dogs have a sense of time and can be trained to perform at certain times.
Dogs' noses are 40 times more powerful than humans'.
Hamsters can store food in their cheeks and carry it back to their burrows.
Hamsters are nocturnal, meaning they are active at night.
Hamsters can run up to 8 miles a night on a wheel.
